title: Week
description: No surprises here, huh? I use Week every day to track my tasks and activities.

title: Craft
description: I use this app for notes. It might be not as powerful as Notion, but it has sick design and everything that I need from such kind of application.

title: VS Code
description: I used to be a WebStorm guy, but now it's impossible to buy a license in Russia so I switched to Microsoft's code editor and it is pretty descent I must say.

title: Telegram
description: It's hard to believe that somebody might use something other than Telegram for everyday messaging. It's the best messenger I've ever used.

title: Linear
description: I use Linear for managing Week's issues. It's really well built piece of software with great attention to details.

title: Fork
description: I rarely use git from command line, so I needed a good GUI client for it. I think Fork is the best.

title: 1Password
description: Yes, I trust all my passwords to one app and it is 1Password. I like UI and UX, it's one of the most pleasant to use Mac apps
